<Text: Instant Karma: All-Time Greatest Hits, a three-disc compilation album of music recorded by John Lennon, is a budget release targeted for sale at warehouse-type stores such as Sam's Club and Costco.>

1:
--------------------
Text: Instant Karma: All-Time Greatest Hits:  The album was released in 2002 by Timeless/Traditions Alive Music under license from Capitol/EMI Special Projects.
Triplets:<Instant Karma
2:
--------------------
Text: Instant Karma: All-Time Greatest Hits:  Disc one, subtitled "The Hits", contained eleven songs that were previously released on singles.
Triplets:<Instant Karma
3:
--------------------
Text: Instant Karma: All-Time Greatest Hits:  Disc two, subtitled "Sings Classic Rock 'N' Roll", contained ten cover songs recorded during Lennon's "Rock 'n' Roll" sessions as well as "Blue Suede Shoes" and "Dizzy, Miss Lizzy," which were recorded live in Toronto in 1969.
